content:
Our 8th annual year-end wrap-up is here! We’re featuring 8 listener voicemails, dope Breakmaster Cylinder remixes & our favorite episodes of the year. Thanks for listening! :green_heart: :link: https://changelog.am/122

Ch Start Title Runs

34 1:40:00 Bye, friends 01:06
35 1:41:05 Closing thoughts 01:18

I didn't get a chance to submit an audio clip, but having the Changelog folks out to the Oxide office for our internal OxCon was a great experience. Thank you for coming out! The episodes you had around Oxide are of course my biased favorites. Looking forward to 2026!
"Bar camps, are still a thing...."
They are! Still enjoy going to them / unconfs in that style
Re Paul Dano - was surprised https://www.independent.co.uk/arts-entertainment/films/news/quentin-tarantino-paul-dano-there-will-be-blood-b2877750.html wasn't referenced!
Disappointed the title of this one wasn’t “Be Kind, Rewind”
@Jarvis ok my early May plans might be changing (was a graduation thing, not a birthday thing) so you might be able to convince me to attend Minnebar 20...
Live show? :wink: They are doing the event at the Best Buy headquarters. It's a pretty big venue.
Jerod and Adam played “Tribute - by Tenacious D”, in real life but in podcast form…
This was not the best podcast in the world...

I too got suckered when the first Dune movie came out. About 3/4 of the way through I was like, there is no way they are wrapping this up. I need to re-watch Over the Top to see how it's aged.

BMC's remixes were so good this year. They're always great but I continue to be amazed.

++ to Nabeel for calling out the balance of AI <-> Non AI episodes. Changelog's become my primary tech podcast this year.

Also, (was it last year) I was concerned the addition of video was going to ruin the audio experience and I wanna call out that that's absolutely not been the case and the audio experience is just as good as before.

Thanks Adam and Jerod!

I really need to submit a recording next year. Feel free to peer pressure me. I listen to 95% of episodes which I now realize may be unusual

It may also be why I’m always behind…..

I listen to every episode, usually
but I added the full back catalogue of Oxide & Friends to my playlist, and that put me quite far behind on The Changelog, haha
I'm trending in the right direction, however, only 60-70 hours of episodes (across all my subscriptions) in my inbox now
